definition: abbr. for 青海[Qing1 hai3], Qinghai Province
a period of time/phase/stage/classifier for issues of a periodical, courses of study/time/term/period/to hope/Taiwan pr. [qi2]

sentences.english: Late adolescence is another transition, this time to leaving home altogether.
sentences.chinese: 青年期後期是另一個轉折，這時候完全地離開家。

sentences.english: Youth sees him on a job and in love.
sentences.chinese: 進入青年期，他工作了，戀愛了。

sentences.english: Puzzlement is another significant characteristic of behaviours in the period of youth.
sentences.chinese: 青年期行爲還有一個重要的特徵就是充滿了困惑。

sentences.english: After youth he again goes through the second phase of childhood， also called as old age.
sentences.chinese: 青年期過後，他又經歷第二個兒童期，即老年期。

sentences.english: The innocence and unsophistication of younger ideals had gone.
sentences.chinese: 青年期的天真純樸的理想是已經過去的了。

sentences.english: It was found that these delinquent tendencies lasted well into early adulthood.
sentences.chinese: 產生不良行爲的趨勢會一直持續到青年期。

sentences.english: To enter into a university is an important thing in adolescence.
sentences.chinese: 進入大學，是發生在青年期的一次重要轉折。

definition: to grow to adulthood/fully grown/the whole year
classifier for years (of age)/year/year (of crop harvests)
